definition: to count and check/to tally/points (collected in some bonus scheme etc)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Why is 2 the bottom and not the rightmost vertex?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼2是底部數而不最右邊的頂點數呢？

sentences.english: Shadowstep now awards one combo point.
sentences.chinese: 暗影步現在獎勵一個連擊點數。

sentences.english: This article gives the design means and work principle for taping electronic component count apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了編帶電子元器件點數儀的設計方法和工作原理。

sentences.english: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent single-precision floating-point number.
sentences.chinese: 將指定的十進制數的值轉換爲等效的單精度浮點數。

sentences.english: Computer principle of a floating point arithmetic unit.
sentences.chinese: 計算機組成原理的一個浮點數運算器。

sentences.english: For floating-point and fixed-point types, M is the total number of digits that can be stored.
sentences.chinese: 對於浮點數及定點類型，M是數字存儲的總位數。

sentences.english: With a view to that, toler can be set to guarantee the success in stop loss.
sentences.chinese: 故此透過追加點數，以確保用家能成功止損。

sentences.english: They don't distinguish between integer and floating point numbers. Variables are typeless.
sentences.chinese: 腳本不區分整數和浮點數，變量是沒有類型的。

sentences.english: The number of students was 665 at the last count.
sentences.chinese: 最後一次點數時，學生的人數爲665人。
製作一個單一浮點數可拖動控制柄。

sentences.english: A higher roll led to more tickets.
sentences.chinese: 骰子擲出的點數越高，彩券得的就越多。

sentences.english: If you're reading a floating point number, there are other concerns.
sentences.chinese: 如果您讀取的浮點數，還有另外需要關注的問題。

sentences.english: This is similar to the modulo operator but it works with floating point numbers.
sentences.chinese: 這是類似於模運算符，但可以使用浮點數。

sentences.english: Converts a specified value to a single-precision floating-point number.
sentences.chinese: 將指定的值轉換爲單精確度浮點數。

sentences.english: The optimal throw of the dice is to bandy them abroad.
sentences.chinese: 擲骰子最好的點數是丟開。
編寫一個單精度浮點數。

definition: integral (calculus)/accumulated points (in sports, at school etc)/total credits earned by student/bonus points in a benefit scheme
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結賬|结账
to cut prices/to discount/to mark down/price cutting
the full amount/to fulfill the quota
